machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 F800 E-1 ;retract
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 X0 Y300 F4800 ;move to start position
G1 X5 Y319 ;move to wait posiotion

machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
G1 X5 Y319 ;move to wait posiotion
T1 ;switch to extruder 2
M109 S{material_print_temperature}
G1 F5000
G12 ;clean nozzle
G1 X0 Y300 F4800 ;move to start point
